classData.comment:
/**
     * Adds an item or Array of items to an array in case it does not already exist.
     * Only primitive items will get found as duplicates
     * @param {Array} arr
     * @param {*} items
     * @returns {Array}
     */
classData.description: Adds an item or Array of items to an array in case it does not already exist. Only primitive items will get found as duplicates
classData.name: add

classData.description: Returns an array of items which are present in array1, but not in array2
classData.name: difference

classData.comment:
/**
     * Checks if the item is included by reference inside the array
     * @param {Array} arr
     * @param {*} item
     */
classData.description: Checks if the item is included by reference inside the array
classData.name: hasItem

classData.comment:
/**
     * Inserts an item or Array of items to an array in case it does not already exist.
     * Duplicates will only get matched by reference.
     * @param {Array} arr
     * @param {Number} index
     * @param {*} items
     * @returns {Array}
     */
classData.description: Inserts an item or Array of items to an array in case it does not already exist. Duplicates will only get matched by reference.
classData.name: insert

classData.comment:
/**
     * Returns an array of items which are present in array1 and array2
     * Only supports primitive items
     * @param {Array} array1=[]
     * @param {Array} array2=[]
     * @returns {Array}
     */
classData.description: Returns an array of items which are present in array1 and array2 Only supports primitive items
classData.name: intersection

classData.comment:
/**
     * Moves an item inside arr from fromIndex to toIndex
     * @param {Array} arr
     * @param {Number} fromIndex
     * @param {Number} toIndex
     */
classData.description: Moves an item inside arr from fromIndex to toIndex
classData.name: move

classData.comment:
/**
     * Removes an item or array of items from an array. Only primitive items will get found
     * @param {Array} arr
     * @param {*} items
     */
classData.description: Removes an item or array of items from an array. Only primitive items will get found
classData.name: remove

classData.comment:
/**
     * Convenience method to combine add & remove in one call.
     * You can pass single items or an array of items to add or to remove.
     * @param {Array} arr
     * @param {*} removeItems
     * @param {*} addItems
     */
classData.description: Convenience method to combine add & remove in one call. You can pass single items or an array of items to add or to remove.
classData.name: removeAdd

classData.comment:
/**
     * Removes an item from an array in case it does exist, otherwise adds it
     * @param {Array} arr
     * @param {*} item
     * @param {Boolean} [add]
     */
classData.description: Removes an item from an array in case it does exist, otherwise adds it
classData.name: toggle

classData.description: Returns an array of items which are present in the passed arrays. Multiple arrays may be passed. Only supports primitive items
classData.name: union

classData.comment:
/**
     * Adds an item or Array of items to an array in case it does not already exist.
     * Only primitive items will get found as duplicates
     * @param {Array} arr
     * @param {*} items
     */
classData.description: Adds an item or Array of items to an array in case it does not already exist. Only primitive items will get found as duplicates
classData.name: unshift
